competitor_factual_moves.description: China acquired recently banned Nvidia chips in Supermicro servers via tenders, as reported by Reuters.

factual_actions.description: Disclosed risk factors related to export controls, trade protection measures, and potential impacts on manufacturing costs, product prices, demand, procurement, and cross-border movement of goods. Also noted elevated backlog for AI-optimized servers due to GPU shortages.
Disclosed manufacturing facilities located in USA, Malaysia, China, Brazil, India, Poland, and Ireland.
Published a blog post discussing policy and AI.

policy_constraints.policy_description: Updated controls to identify controlled chips using criteria including total performance and performance density, implemented via Federal Register.
policy_constraints.issuing_authority: Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS), U.S. Department of Commerce

policy_constraints.policy_description: Strengthened restrictions on advanced computing semiconductors, enhancing foundry due diligence and preventing diversion to the PRC. Builds on previous controls from Oct 7, 2022, and Oct 17, 2023.
policy_constraints.issuing_authority: Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS), U.S. Department of Commerce

sources.name: Commerce Strengthens Restrictions on Advanced Computing Semiconductors to Enhance Foundry Due Diligence and Prevent Diversion to PRC
